SQL: SELECT DISTINCT rsc.* FROM REP_SUBSTANCE_CATEGORY rsc LEFT JOIN T_S_USERCARDINFO tsu ON rsc.create_by = tsu.user_name LEFT JOIN t_s_user tsus ON tsu.user_card_id = tsus.cardid LEFT JOIN T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub ON tsrub.userid = tsus. ID WHERE tsrub.orgid IN ( SELECT T . ID FROM T_S_DEPART T START WITH T . ID = ( SELECT DISTINCT tsrub.orgid FROM T_S_ROLE_USER_BASE tsrub WHERE tsrub.userid = '${userId}' ) CONNECT BY T .parentdepartid = PRIOR T . ID ) AND rsc.ISDELETED NOT IN (1) ORDER BY rsc.CREATE_DATE DESC
